"A.P.241/4/17/15:50": "Hitsugi... Yasaka?"
"Big... sis..."
"I'm so glad, big sis... You woke up and I'm so... glad......"
"Hmm, this will take some getting used to. No matter, I'm sure I'll fully control it soon."
"...Where is Aru?"
"You saw it for yourself, Hitsugi. I've absorbed that catalyst."
"I'm glad you woke up. Combined with your escape from the moon, your access here through PSO2 shows great promise. However... you were just a bit too late."
"Aru is... in Mother... You mean he's inside of you?"
"Yes...? What about it?"
"I see..."
"What odd and unpleasant laughter, Hitsugi Yasaka. I can't understand why you're smiling."
"There's a lot to being a girl. Cowardice, frustration, anger... With all of those mixed together, all I can do now is laugh."
"You should go back to sleep once more. The next time you wake up, everything should be finished."
"But, you know... I finally understand. I understand what I need to do."
"What...?"
"I was such an idiot. Careless, reckless, acting without thinking. Pitiful, crying about everything."
"But, I've experienced all those already. I won't act like that again. I'll never forget those feelings."
"I hate being scared, and I hate being in pain. But above all else, I hate being alone!"
"I don't want to lose anyone anymore! I don't want to let anyone disappear! I'll protect the things that matter to me!"
"That's it, right... it's only natural! The place where I belong is... the place where I stand right now!"
"That's why... I won't decieve myself anymore!"
"What is... that armor... that appearance...?! There are no records of it within me!"
"That's... one of the three swords of the gods... Ame no Murakumo?"
"I'm going to save everyone."
"Call me greedy, if you like. But that's what I'm going to do."
"That's the decision we made together."
"Mother! I'm going to defeat you and take Aru back! That's my only goal!"
"This is what I've chosen!"
"Tch! Kohri Washinomiya!"
"What?! It won't even budge! This is completely different from the previous Hitsugi!"
"You're saying her wavering will has completely solidified?"
"...<%me>, Matoi, Hitsugi... they're all doing their best."
"As an Administrator, I can't just sit here and give up!"

"ARKS Ship Administrative High CAST!
The power of the Xiera type...
shouldn't be underestimated!"
"Taking back the ship's controls and putting them under your control? You've done it now, grandniece!"
"I find it offensive that you think I'm just some flustered child."
"However... taking back the controls is my limit. Controlling all the data across the ship is... Further assistance is not... possible."
"If possible, I wanted to destroy this ship. However, the situation has turned against us. The time has come."
"We will leave this place. Ophiel, activate the isolation field."
"But Mother! Hitsugi is..."
"Endure it for now. There will be another opportunity soon."
"Hitsugi, just wait! I'm going to come back for you, no matter what!"
"...Kohri."
"Are you okay, Xiera?!"
"You're Hitsugi, right?"
"Ms. Matoi... <%me>..."
"I'm sorry, I'm so sorry... I couldn't protect Aru..."
"1. It must have been painful."
"2. Welcome back."
"It was painful. But that's over... It doesn't matter now."
"Yeah, I'm back. But this isn't the time for celebration.'"
"I'm sorry, <%me>. Because I've been so hesitant, I didn't make it in time, and they took Aru."
"But I'll definitely get him back. Not just Aru, I'll save everyone. That's what I've chosen."
"No matter how selfish they say it is, I'm going to do it. Because I have decided so."
"After all, it's a big sister's job to save her little bother. Just wait for me, Aru."
"Because I have decided so"
"覚悟"
